title: Animated Medieval Bows
description: AAA quality Bows with 4K textures, 3 LODs, & fully animated / rigged arms. 58 assets in all!
longDescription:
Preview: https://youtu.be/rvDK21a2zVs

Take aim with this Medieval Bows. A Longbow, Recurved bow and Homemade bow. This pack also includes a set of animated FP arms. The perfect pack for any project set in the days of yore.
technicalDetails:
58 Assets

(3) Ultra High AAA Quality Medieval Bows

• Homemade Bow (7,962 Tris / 5,009 Verts)

• Longbow (2,973 Tris / 1,990 Verts)

• Recurve Bow (7,962 Tris / 5,009 Verts)


(9) Medieval Bow LODs

• Homemade Bow 25% (1,989 Tris / 1,471 Verts)

• Homemade Bow 50% (3,981 Tris / 2,656 Verts)

• Homemade Bow 75% (5,970 Tris / 3,780 Verts)

• Longbow 25% (644 Tris / 743 Verts)

• Longbow 50% (1,485 Tris / 1,111 Verts)

• Longbow 75% (2,229 Tris / 1,546 Verts)

• Recurve Bow 25% (1,444 Tris / 1,039 Verts)

• Recurve Bow 50% (2,890 Tris / 1,922 Verts)

• Recurve Bow 75% (4,336 Tris / 2,791 Verts)


(15) Medieval Bow PBR Textures @ 4096x4096

• Base Color, Metalness, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, for all 3 bows


(3) Medieval Bow Skeletal Rigs

• Homemade Bow Skeletal Rig (10 bones)

• Longbow Skeletal Rig (11 bones)

• Recurve Bow Skeletal Rig (8 bones)


(18) First Person Animations (Idle, Shoot, Aim Idle, Aim Shoot, Holster, Unholster for all 3 bows)


(1) Ultra High AAA Quality First Person Arms (12,120 Tris / 6,094 Verts)

(1) First Person Arms LOD (50% - 6,060 Tris / 3,063 Verts)

(1) First Person Arms Skeletal Rig (70 bones)

(5) First Person Arms PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 (Base Color, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, Metalness)


(2) Arrows

• Standard Arrow (1,088 Tris / 768 Verts)

• Homemade Arrow (112 Tris / 90 Verts)
